Title: Relates to rent registration statements to be filed for vacant units
Summary: Requires owners of housing accommodations subject to rent registration to file an additional statement at three month intervals, until the unit is occupied.
LawCode: Amd ยง12-a, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd ยง26-517, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to rent registration statements for vacant units
